animeTitle: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta... OVA (Dub)
otherNames: Hamefura OVA, I Reincarnated into an Otome Game as a Villainess With Only Destruction Flags…, Destruction Flag Otome, 乙女ゲームの破滅フラグしかない悪役令嬢に転生してしまった… OAD
synopsis: The OVA will tell the childhood stories of the main characters, adapting from the first volume of Satoru Yamaguchi's original light novel. Bundled with the seventh limited edition volume of the manga.
